DialogText:
-Raiding is key. Civilian, military and ancient sites spawn throughout the wasteland. All sites contain treasure such as ammo, food, weapons, money, raw materials, drugs and artifacts.

-Use the buildings to take shelter at night.

-Military buildings are made of rockcrete and cannot be breached by mobs.

-Many buildings spawn with beds so that you can sleep while taking shelter.

-You can smelt steel blocks and steel siding down into steel. Tear down those blocks for easy steel.

-Many buildings contain secret stashes. Search them well.

-Follow the questbook and check it frequently.

-The Teleport Beacon can be very useful, take advantage of it.

-Many quests unlock repeatable rewards that allow you to periodically get cheap or free food, water, weaponry, ammo, complicated materials and credits.
